mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION(RE_BRANCH, RE_NAME, RE_TEL1, RE_TEL2, RE_TEL3, RE_PWD, RE_DATE, RE_STADIUM, RE_TIME, RE_TOTALPAY, RE_MEMO, RE_PAYMENT) VALUES(#{re_branch}, #{re_name}, #{re_tel1}, #{re_tel2}, #{re_tel3}, #{re_pwd}, #{re_date}, #{re_stadium}, #{re_time}, #{re_totalpay}, #{re_memo}, '결제완료')
mapper.select: SELECT T.TIME_NO, T.TIME_START, T.TIME_END FROM TIME T WHERE T.TIME_NO NOT IN ( SELECT R.RE_TIME FROM RESERVATION R WHERE R.RE_BRANCH = #{re_branch} AND R.RE_DATE = #{re_date} AND R.RE_STADIUM = #{re_stadium})

SELECT R.*, B.BRANCH_NAME, S.STADIUM_NAME, T.TIME_START, T.TIME_END FROM RESERVATION R JOIN BRANCH B ON R.RE_BRANCH = B.BRANCH_NO JOIN STADIUM S ON R.RE_STADIUM = S.STADIUM_NO JOIN TIME T ON R.RE_TIME = T.TIME_NO WHERE R.RE_NAME = #{re_name} AND R.RE_PWD = #{re_pwd} ORDER BY R.RE_NO DESC

SELECT R.*, B.BRANCH_NAME, S.STADIUM_NAME, T.TIME_START, T.TIME_END FROM RESERVATION R JOIN BRANCH B ON R.RE_BRANCH = B.BRANCH_NO JOIN STADIUM S ON R.RE_STADIUM = S.STADIUM_NO JOIN TIME T ON R.RE_TIME = T.TIME_NO ORDER BY R.RE_NO DESC
